Articles.Content: In Ksp your ships, if they fly well they always fly well. Nothing ever goes wrong. I was thinking if there could be snowstorms and hurricanes and tornadoes and thunderstormsthat can pose a threat. Like the snow makes driving a rover hard. And the thunderstorm takes out a random part every so often. And the Hurricanes can throw stuff off course. And why don't I do the circumnavigation challenges? Because nothing ever goes wrong. And having a level 3 tracking station can keep track of these storms. This will add a whole new level of interest and challenge to Ksp.
I would like to have it, but it's on the WNTS list, so I'm pretty sure SQUAD knows that wpeople want it.
Weather is on the What Not To Suggest list due to repetitive suggestions. Sorry, have to close this one.
